1370: Kornillis was born in St. Joris straet in 1370.
Got married to Sarre at age 32 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Sarre, Margareta, at age 32.
1371: Had a son with Sarre, Alvericus, at age 33.
1373: Had a daughter with Sarre, Nannen, at age 35.
Lost daughter Nannen when Nannen was 1 years old.
1378: Had a daughter with Sarre, Clara, at age 40.
1379: Had a son with Sarre, Assceric, at age 41.
1380: Had a daughter with Sarre, Yda, at age 42.
1381: Had a daughter with Sarre, Truden, at age 43.
1383: Had a son with Sarre, Gisekin, at age 45.
